    • Uses of Prerequisite in com.pathfindersdk.prerequisites

      Subclasses of Prerequisite in com.pathfindersdk.prerequisites 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbilityPrerequisite
      This class requires a character to have an ability score (AbilityStat) at a specific value or higher (ex: Dodge feat requires Dex 13).
      class  FeatPrerequisite
      This class requires a character to have a specific feat (ex: Mobility requires Dodge).
      class  SkillPrerequisite
      This class requires a character to have a skill (SkillStat) at a specific rank or higher (ex: Mounted Combat requires Ride 1).
